page.title: 10Life on Sycamore Farm Helme
page.content:
Sycamore Farm was originally part of Helme Hall Estate.The farm house and cottages were used as a candle factory and oil refinery befoe conversion.
Usually farms in this area are hill farms where the land is suitable only for grazing.Land in Helme is reasonably good but still is considered a less-favoured area.Grants can therefore be claimed from the Ministry of Agriculture for certain things e.g. ploughing,re-seeding,wall building,new buildings or extensions.
To supplement the income from the farm, Mr.Hague takes driving jobs and snow ploughing in the winter while Mrs.Hague works full time as a non-teaching assistant at Helme School.
